title: Previous Name Display
body: So I recently changed my name from KingX to iAkeno and when I invite people they always ask me who I am.I was thinking maybe rito should make a little bar that shows all the previous names of all the people who changed their names to avoid confusion.

replies.body:
I don't think so, some of us change names to avoid harassment, I had to do it. Since OCE is not that large you inevitably end up playing with the same players often enough that you recognise each other.

Some games you get those asses who are just asses and want to ruin your day, but sometimes you get those types of players who will purposely go out of their way if you to make your day miserable. It does get to the point you get the same type of player recognise you and just make your day miserable to the point you need to change your name to at least stop the harassment.

The solotuion is simple,they should add a show/hide feature to the name bar for privacy reason.
I just emailed rito about this idea and they said they can't directly tell the development team about feedbacks and stuff.
Wouldn't hurt, maybe if it wasn't permanent though in case someone else choosing the old summoner name.
